languages.text: [Кивнуть смутьянам в толпе] "Эти люди оскорбляют тех, кто самим Троном поставлен над ними, а значит — заслужили смерть".

traits.locale_text: [Кивнуть смутьянам в толпе] "Эти люди оскорбляют тех, кто самим Троном поставлен над ними, а значит — заслужили смерть".

languages.text: [Nod at the rabble-rousers in the crowd] "The people before you insult those instated by the Throne to be above them, and thus they deserve death."
languages.original_text: [Кивнуть смутьянам в толпе] "Эти люди оскорбляют тех, кто самим Троном поставлен над ними, а значит — заслужили смерть".

[Nod at the rabble-rousers in the crowd] "The people before you insult those instated by the Throne to be above them, and thus they deserve death."

languages.text: [群衆にいる民衆扇動家たちを見てうなずく]「お前たちの前にいる者たちは王座により任命された支配者を侮辱した。その罪は死に値する」
languages.original_text: [Nod at the rabble-rousers in the crowd] "The people before you insult those instated by the Throne to be above them, and thus they deserve death."

traits.locale_text: [群衆にいる民衆扇動家たちを見てうなずく]「お前たちの前にいる者たちは王座により任命された支配者を侮辱した。その罪は死に値する」

languages.text: [朝人群中的煽动者点头]“你们面前的这些人侮辱了那些由黄金王座任命的统治者。因此，他们理当处以死刑。”
languages.original_text: [Nod at the rabble-rousers in the crowd] "The people before you insult those instated by the Throne to be above them, and thus they deserve death."

traits.locale_text: [朝人群中的煽动者点头]“你们面前的这些人侮辱了那些由黄金王座任命的统治者。因此，他们理当处以死刑。”

languages.text: [Asentir a los agitadores entre la multitud] «Los que tenéis delante insultan a los investidos por el Trono para ser superiores a ellos y, por ello, merecen morir».
languages.original_text: [Nod at the rabble-rousers in the crowd] "The people before you insult those instated by the Throne to be above them, and thus they deserve death."

traits.locale_text: [Asentir a los agitadores entre la multitud] «Los que tenéis delante insultan a los investidos por el Trono para ser superiores a ellos y, por ello, merecen morir».

languages.text: [Prendre le parti des agitateurs] « Ces gens insultent leurs dirigeants, institués par le Trône. Ils méritent donc la mort. »
languages.original_text: [Nod at the rabble-rousers in the crowd] "The people before you insult those instated by the Throne to be above them, and thus they deserve death."

traits.locale_text: [Prendre le parti des agitateurs] « Ces gens insultent leurs dirigeants, institués par le Trône. Ils méritent donc la mort. »

languages.text: [Den Unruhestiftern in der Menge zunicken] "Die Leute vor Euch beleidigen jene, die der Thron über sie gestellt hat, und verdienen daher den Tod."
languages.original_text: [Nod at the rabble-rousers in the crowd] "The people before you insult those instated by the Throne to be above them, and thus they deserve death."

traits.locale_text: [Den Unruhestiftern in der Menge zunicken] "Die Leute vor Euch beleidigen jene, die der Thron über sie gestellt hat, und verdienen daher den Tod."

languages.text: [Kalabalığın içindeki kışkırtıcıları başınla onayla] "Karşınızdaki bu kişiler, Taht'ın atadığı üstlerine hakaret etme cüreti göstermiş ve ölümü hak etmiştir."
languages.original_text: [Nod at the rabble-rousers in the crowd] "The people before you insult those instated by the Throne to be above them, and thus they deserve death."

traits.locale_text: [Kalabalığın içindeki kışkırtıcıları işaret et] "Karşınızdaki bu kişiler, Taht tarafından atanmış üslerini aşağılama cüreti gösteriyorlar, dolayısıyla da ölmeyi hak etmişlerdir."
